creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
text: Originally designed as cover of the October 1926 issue of the magazine The Ladies' Graphics (Fujin gurafu 婦人グラフ). Then published in July 1930 as cover to a songlet of the series Complete Compositions by Nakayama Shinpei, Folk Songs (Nakayama Shinpei sakkyoku zenshū, Min'yō kyoku 中山晋平作曲全集　民謡曲).
title: Design for the songlet Dream woman
